page.title: 08Life of a Market Gardener.
page.content: On July the first I interviewed Mr Boers at Mill Farm. Mr Boers is a market gardener. He was in his office working with his computer. He has a large market garden. He grows lettuces,freesias and geraniums.He has a machine called a blocking machine. The workers put soil in a big tray send it down a conveyor belt into the machine. This forms it into blocks then tubes fixed together make holes in the soil so they can plant the seeds.Some of the workers do it by hand.He has fourteen employees.He has lots of different machinery.He plants half a million lettuce per week.He irrigates his land with water from the river.A van takes seedlings all over the United States of America.He works up to eighty hours a week.He is a very busy man.
